original_text: Another man who was one of Jesus' disciples said to him, ‘Sir, I want to come with you. But first, let me go home and bury my father. Then I will come with you.’
korean_text: 제자 중에 또 한 사람이 이르되 주여 내가 먼저 가서 내 아버지를 장사하게 허락하옵소서

sentences.original_text: Another man who was one of Jesus' disciples said to him
sentences.korean_translation: 예수의 제자 중 한 사람이었던 또 다른 사람이 그에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: 'Sir, I want to come with you
But first, let me go home and bury my father
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 먼저, 집에 가서 아버지를 장사하게 해주세요'

sentences.original_text: Then I will come with you.'
